page.title: 14YSGOL Y DRINDOD,GWERSYLLT
page.content: This is my school.It is a Junior Primary School and has children from seven to eleven years old.Children come here from Ysgol Bryn Golau,the Infant School.The school was opened in 1977 and is a modern design called 'an open plan school'.This means that the classrooms or bases have no doors only curtains. The headmaster is Mr.M.Hopwood and the Deputy Headmaster is Mr.A.Owens. There are nine other teachers.This year, 1985, we have 250 children divided into nine classes. The fourth year classes are taught in wooden huts outside because there is not enough space for them in the main building. When we leave we go to Bryn Alyn. This was opened in 1972.The school has over 1000 pupils. {ANDREA PETERS AGED 10
